Name: John
description:
John lives in the outskirts of Ntungamo town, with his wife and children. He is into agriculture, mainly banana growing. He opted for food crops because they mature in a short period of time and their market is readily available due to the fact that people eat everyday. His clients include most of the food markets in Ntungamo and Mbarara.

He has applied for a loan to buy organic fertilizers for his farm. He is hopeful that he will harvest good yields, which will attract competitive prices, thereby fetching a huge profit. He hopes to use the money to pay his children's school fees and also repay the loan. He appreciates the lenders for their support.

The lady in the photo is a credit officer.
